UnitDefinition.Name: Focal commodity replacement method types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Focal commodity replacement method types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Replace samples with focal commodity samples
Unit.ShortName: Replace samples with focal commodity samples
Unit.Description: Replace all samples of the selected focal commodity/commodities.

Unit.Name: Append focal commodity samples
Unit.Description: Add the samples of the focal commodity/commodities to the background concentration data.

Unit.Name: Replace measurements of focal food/substance combinations with measurements from focal commodity samples
Unit.ShortName: Replace measurements of focal food/substance combinations with measurements from focal commodity samples
Unit.Description: Replace the substance concentrations of the background concentrations by substance concentrations from the focal commodity concentration data.

Unit.Name: Remove measurements of focal food/substance combinations
Unit.ShortName: Remove measurements of focal food/substance combinations
Unit.Description: Remove substance measurements for the selected focal food/substance combinations.

Unit.Name: Replace measurements of focal food/substance combinations with proposed concentration limit value from data
Unit.ShortName: Replace measurements of focal food/substance combinations with concentration limit value from data
Unit.Description: Replace the substance concentrations of the background concentrations with a proposed concentration limit value from data.

Unit.Name: Replace measurements of focal food/substance combinations with proposed concentration limit value
Unit.ShortName: Replace measurements of focal food/substance combinations with proposed concentration limit value
Unit.Description: Replace the substance concentrations of the background concentrations with a proposed concentration limit value (in mg/kg).
